short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over imgur gallery comments containing a number( ex: #1 ) to preview the image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imgur users, have you ever scrolled through a large gallery of images, and seen comments referring to (for example) image #1. If you have ever wanted to be able to preview the image the comment was referring to without having to scroll through the gallery again then this is the extension for you. Preview gallery images as if they were direct links with Imgurs built in hover ability.
